name: The 4-Hour Work Week
author: Timothy Ferriss
description: The 4-Hour Workweek is a new way of solving a very old problem: just how can we work to live and prevent our lives from being all about work?

name: The Art of War
author: Sun Tzu
description: The Art of War (Chinese: 孫子兵法) is an ancient Chinese military treatise dating from the Late Spring and Autumn Period (roughly 5th century BC).

name: The Magic of Thinking Big
author: David J. Schwartz
description: Millions of readers have acquired the secrets of success through The Magic of Thinking Big. Achieve everything you always wanted: financial security, power and influence.

name: Outliers
author: Malcolm Gladwell
description: Outliers, being the most extreme observations, may include the sample maximum or sample minimum, or both, depending on whether they are extremely high or low

name: The Decision Book
author: Mikael Krogerus and Roman Tschappler
description: A short, sharp guide to tackling life's biggest challenges: understanding ourselves and making the right choices

name: The Forty Rules of Love
author: Elif Shafak
description: The Forty Rules of Love is a novel written by the Turkish author Elif Shafak. The book was published in March 2009. It is about Maulana Jalal-Ud-Din.
